body:
Hypre latest version 2.22.1 breaks MFEM and PETSc.
This PR is suggested by @scheibelp for MFEM and @balay for PETSc.
This does alter sundial, despite @balay reports it may be broken by Hypre update from PR   https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/25781
To be complete, I changed a bit what @scheibelp advised since MFEM 4.3 accepts hypre up to 2.22.0 not only 2.20.0.
title: mfem and petsc: alter hypre dependencies
